name: cypress-accessibility-checker

scripts.test: npm run build:report && start-server-and-test 'npm run test:start-http' 8080 'cd test && cypress run'
scripts.test:open: npm run build:report && cd test && cypress open
scripts.build:report: (cd ../report-react && npm run build && cd ../cypress-accessibility-checker && shx cp ../report-react/build/genReport.js ./src/lib/reporters/)
scripts.package:common: npm run build:report && rm -rf package && mkdir package && cp -R *.js src package/ && cp package.json package/ && cp README.md package/
scripts.package:zip: npm run package:common && cd package && npm pack
